DESC.PARA: A nonthermal pair plasma model based on that of Lightman and Zdziarski (1987, ApJ 319, 643) from Magdziarz and Zdziarski. It includes angle-dependent reflection from Magdziarz and Zdziarski (1995, MNRAS 273, 837). The abundances are set up by the set_xsabund command.
This is an additive model component.

ROW.DATA: scaling factor for reflection; 1 = isotropic source above disk
Thomson optical depth of ionization electrons (e.g. 0)
minimum Lorentz factor of the power law injection; not used for monoenergetic injection
minimum Lorentz factor for nonthermal reprocessing; 1 < g0 <= gmin
pair escape rate in c; 0 <= paires <= 1, see Zdziarski 1985, ApJ, 289, 514
iron abundance relative to that defined by set_xsabund
photon flux of the direct component without reflection at 1 keV in the observer's frame.

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.
